<tei-TEI data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="TEI" data-origatts="xmlns">

           <tei-sourceDesc data-origname="sourceDesc">
              <tei-bibl data-origname="bibl">Unbelievably True to the Artist's Playing - That's why I bough it</tei-bibl>

                    </tei-publisher>
                    <tei-pubPlace ref="https://www.geonames.org/5128581" data-origname="pubPlace" data-origatts="ref">New York</tei-pubPlace>

    <tei-facsimile data-origname="facsimile">
        <tei-surface data-origname="surface">
            <tei-graphic url="miun.act2359.0061.001-seq_152.tif" width="2809" height="3648" data-origname="graphic" data-origatts="height width url" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2346,2399 2387,2496 2387,2567 2365,2590 1371,2590 1371,2492 1056,2492 445,2486 397,2421 397,2383 431,2375" id="eSc_textblock_f14f8ddd" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="733,2869 470,2851 462,2602 492,2601 1379,2601 1379,2869" id="eSc_textblock_03db0457" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2346,2610 2346,2867 2329,2869 1402,2869 1402,2601 2355,2601" id="eSc_textblock_5abd2d51" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="860,3210 860,2919 1920,2919 1924,2928 1924,3210" id="eSc_textblock_5837879e" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1230,3239 1230,3497 1556,3497 1556,3239" id="eSc_textblock_dbdcd861" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2541,3315 2541,3378 267,3370 262,3282 262,3285" id="eSc_textblock_b603b3c0" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="479,343 479,2360 2349,2360 2349,343" id="eSc_textblock_d59aeee7" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_d59aeee7" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_f14f8ddd" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-head data-origname="head">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                <tei-quote type="testimonial" data-origname="quote" data-origatts="type">
                    "Unbelievably True to the Artist's Playing-
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-hi rendition="#i" class="i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">That's why I bought it</tei-hi>"
                </tei-quote>
            </tei-head>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_03db0457" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-p data-origname="p">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                <tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                    <tei-hi rendition="#i" class="i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">T</tei-hi>he
                </tei-hi>
                infinite joy and satisfaction that attend the
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>possession of a thing which is the best of its
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>kind go with the purchase of the
                <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">
                    Welte-Mignon
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Licensee
                    Reproducing Piano
                </tei-name>.
                It brings you the world's
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>finest music,
                <tei-seg ana="#personality" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">
                    played with all the tone-color, the fire, the
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>verve, the <tei-hi rendition="#i" class="i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">personality</tei-hi> of the great pianists.
                </tei-seg>
                You have but
            </tei-p>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_5abd2d51" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-p data-origname="p">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>to hear it to realize that
                <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    its playing is the artist's playing.
                </tei-seg>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Your piano marchant will be proud to give you a
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>demonstration any time.
                <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">
                    Welte-Mignon Licensee
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Reproducing
                    Pianos
                </tei-name> are offered by 115 leading piano
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>manufacturers.
                <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">
                    The Auto Pneumatic Action
                    Company
                </tei-orgName>,
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                <tei-persName data-origname="persName">W. C. Heaton, President</tei-persName>,
                <tei-address data-origname="address">653 West 51st Street, New York.</tei-address>
            </tei-p>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_5837879e" type="brand-elements" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte-Mignon
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Licensee
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Reproducing Piano
            </tei-name>

            <tei-seg type="slogan" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type">
                <tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The Master's Fingers on Your Piano
                </tei-hi>
            </tei-seg>

            <tei-figure type="logo" data-origname="figure" data-origatts="type">
                <tei-desc data-origname="desc">Phantom hands on a keyboard.</tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
        </tei-div>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
